div.p: This is a simple clinical reasoning module to remind clinicians to discuss screening for prostate cancer.
The intent is twofold: Keep the reasoning as simple as possible, and allow customizations that incorporate patient and clinician preferences.
The main sections of this IG are:

ul.li: Background - provides business context for the implementation guide and information that implementers should be familiar with before reading the remainder of the IG. There could be multiple pages for this.
Detailed Specification - The actual stuff implementers are expected to do. (Could be multiple pages for this.)
Downloads - Allows downloading a copy of this implementation guide and other useful information
